header_text: You and your significant other have been caught up on your own responsibilities recently, and you feel as though you; 're drifting apart. You decide to plan a dinner date with them, to spend some quality time just the two of you. At dinner, you feel as though you're starting all of the conversations, and your partner seems uninterested.

elements.text: You decide to share how you're feeling with them, and they tell you they've just been tired from work and home responsibilities, and didn't realize how much it was affecting your relationship. You feel...
